00023 #include <Fluide_Quasi_Compressible.h>
00024 #include <Discretisation_base.h>
00025 #include <Navier_Stokes_QC.h>

00027 Implemente_instanciable(Navier_Stokes_QC,"Navier_Stokes_QC",Navier_Stokes_Fluide_Dilatable_base);
00028 // XD navier_stokes_QC navier_stokes_standard navier_stokes_QC -1 Navier-Stokes equation for a quasi-compressible fluid.
00029 
00030 Sortie& Navier_Stokes_QC::printOn(Sortie& is) const
00031 {
00032   return Navier_Stokes_Fluide_Dilatable_base::printOn(is);
00033 }
00034 
00035 Entree& Navier_Stokes_QC::readOn(Entree& is)
00036 {
00037   Navier_Stokes_Fluide_Dilatable_base::readOn(is);
00038   assert(le_fluide.non_nul());
00039   if (!sub_type(Fluide_Quasi_Compressible,le_fluide.valeur()))
00040     {
00041       Cerr<<"ERROR : the Navier_Stokes_QC equation can be associated only to a quasi compressible fluid."<<finl;
00042       Process::exit();
00043     }
00044   return is;
00045 }

00065 //! Complete l'equation base,<br>associe la pression a l'equation,<br>complete la divergence, le gradient et le solveur pression.<br>Ajout de 2 termes sources: l'un representant la force centrifuge<br>dans le cas axi-symetrique,l'autre intervenant dans la resolution<br>en 2D axisymetrique
00066 void Navier_Stokes_QC::completer()
00067 {
00068   Cerr<<"Navier_Stokes_QC::completer"<<finl;
00069   if (le_fluide->a_gravite())
00070     {
00071       Cerr << "Gravity = " << le_fluide->gravite() << finl;
00072       Cerr << "Creation of the buoyancy source term for the Navier_Stokes_QC equation : " << finl;
00073       Source t;
00074       Source& so=les_sources.add(t);
00075       Nom type_so = "Source_QC_Gravite_";
00076       Nom disc = discretisation().que_suis_je();
00077       if (disc=="VEFPreP1B") disc = "VEF";
00078       type_so += disc;
00079       so.typer_direct(type_so);
00080       so->associer_eqn(*this);
00081       Cerr << so->que_suis_je() << finl;
00082     }
00083   Navier_Stokes_Fluide_Dilatable_base::completer();
00084 }
00085 
00086 int Navier_Stokes_QC::impr(Sortie& os) const
00087 {
00088   return Navier_Stokes_Fluide_Dilatable_base::impr(os);
00089 }
